amendment.description: An amendment numbered 137 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph that the Secretary shall identify areas to lease within the approximately 224,793.73 acres, including approximately 200,518.28 acres of National Forest System lands, approximately 15,464.99 acres of public lands, and approximately 8,810.46 acres of reserved Federal mineral interest within the Thompson Divide area in Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
